mdRecord.dcterms:title: Via-Wade Cemetery, Indian Valley
mdRecord.dcterms:description:
This small cemetery sits off the corner of Shady Grove Rd NW (Rt 624) and Windsor Rd. NW (Rt 760) on the entrance to a large tree farm. It consists of two large headstones and four graves. It is not fenced except for a decorative section of split-rail. It is in need of mowing but not overgrown. It is visible from both Google Earth and Google Maps.
N 36 51.495' W 80 32.717'
